invalid_channel.message: illegal arg: channel code must be in uppercase

invalid_json.message: The body request is not in a valid JSON format

invalid_api_key.message: The API key provided is invalid. Please make sure to use the secret/public API key that you can obtain from the Xendit Dashboard. See https://developers.xendit.co/api-reference/#authentication for more details

amount_below_minimum.message: illegal arg: amount must be at least '{{minimum_amount}}', but got '{{invalidAmount}}'

amount_above_maximum.message: illegal arg: amount must be at most '{{maximum_amount}}', but got '{{invalidAmount}}'

amount_not_within_the_range.message: illegal arg: amount must be within '{{minimum_amount}} to {{maximum_amount}}', but got '{{invalidAmount}}'

missing_reference_id.message: illegal arg: merchant reference ID is required

missing_customer_name.message: illegal arg: customer Name must not be empty

change_amount_not_supported.message: illegal arg: changing amount is not supported by 7Eleven

change_7eleven_payer_not_supported.message: illegal arg: changing payer is not supported by 7Eleven

change_7eleven_expiry_not_supported.message: illegal arg: changing expiry is not supported by 7Eleven

expected_amount_not_match.message: wrong amount: expecting amount to be ₱200.00, but got ₱100.00

payment_code_already_used.message: already used: code is single use

customer_name_limit_exceeded.message: illegal arg: this channel can only display at most {{maximum_char_limit}}-character long customer name, but got {{invalidChar}}

description_limit_exceeded.message: illegal arg: this channel can only display at most {{minimum_description_char_limit}}-character long description, but got {{invalidChar}}

bank_not_supported.message: That bank code is not currently supported

access_permission_denied.message: The API key is forbidden to perform this request

diacritics_not_supported.message: illegal arg: customer Name contains disallowed characters

back_dated_expiry_is_invalid.message: invalid expiry: expiry date must be a future date
